title: Tempest
description: LOVE is the strongest Magick...A Reunion in the Land of Alainnshire:An open market in Arianrhod one year after Prince Jariathâ€™s attack leads to a chance meeting on the outskirts of the kingdom, throwing life into chaos for three women and their families.One is delighted to finally meet her mother but horrified by the circumstances of her birth. One must now confront a brutal past. And one will learn to walk a fine line between the woman she was and the one she is becoming. A missing prince. A man burning for revenge. A king with inconceivable powers. A storm bred in cruelty and fueled by hatred is about to be unleashed. Who will survive the tempest?
author: S.L. Jesberger
